articles.title: Biden calls Trump and MAGA Republicans a threat to 'the very foundations of America' - CBC News
articles.description: U.S. President Joe Biden warned Thursday that "equality and democracy are under assault" in the U.S, sounding an alarm about his predecessor, Donald Trump, and "MAGA Republican" adherents.
articles.content: U.S. President Joe Biden warned Thursday night that "equality and democracy are under assault" in the U.S. as he sounded an alarm about his predecessor, Donald Trump, and "MAGA Republican" adherents … [+4819 chars]

articles.author: ABC News
articles.title: US President Joe Biden takes aim at Donald Trump and 'Make America Great Again' Republicans - ABC News
articles.description: In a prime-time speech, Joe Biden tells Americans that Donald Trump and MAGA Republicans "represent an extremism that threatens the very foundations of our republic".
articles.content:
US President Joe Biden says Donald Trump's allies are undermining the country's democratic foundations and has urged voters to reject extremism ahead of mid-term elections in November.
